t: Harcourt (publisher) - Wikipedia
s: April 14, 2025 - It was known at different stages in its history as Harcourt Brace, & Co. and Harcourt Brace Jovanovich. From 1919 to 1982, it was based in New York City. The company was last based in San Diego, California, with editorial/sales/marketing/rights offices in New York City and Orlando, Florida,

t: Harcourt, Inc. | WWEnd
